page.title: 20THE DOMESDAY PROJECT 1985
page.content: Twenty-eight children from{Class 5 at{Cowling County Primary School compiled all the data and helped with the text of this project.They were 10 and 11 years old at the time. {Mrs.Mary Clough,Class Teacher,}and {Mr. Antony Coe,Headmaster,}were helped enormously by the childrens' enthusiasm for the work,which included so much that it was impossible to use it all.In addition to the entries recorded,a lot of other valuable work,including Art Work was produced. All the children have been involved in seeing their own writing entered on the text pages . Our grateful thanks to all the people who helped us,including{Mr.Dennis {Clough,}who took the photographs. On {Tuesday 2 July 1985}we had a special evening at school for 200 parents and friends,who came to look at the work.
